languages.text: "Вот и подозреваемый. Похоже, этот Гведон прикончил товарища и устроил кровавый спектакль. Хротко отвечает за аресты черни, стоит справиться у него насчет этого Гведона".

"We have our suspect. It looks like Gwedon killed his fellow worker and put on this entire bloody spectacle. Hrotko is the one responsible for arresting the rabble, so he'll be our best candidate for shedding some light on this Gwedon character."
languages.original_text: "Вот и подозреваемый. Похоже, этот Гведон прикончил товарища и устроил кровавый спектакль. Хротко отвечает за аресты черни, стоит справиться у него насчет этого Гведона".

traits.locale_text: "We have our suspect. It looks like Gwedon killed his fellow worker and put on this entire bloody spectacle. Hrotko is responsible for rounding up the rabble, so he's the one who can shed some light on this Gwedon character."

languages.text: « Nous tenons notre suspect. Tout porte à croire que Gwedon a tué son binôme et orchestré cette sanglante mise en scène. Hrotko étant responsable du maintien de l'ordre, c'est le plus indiqué pour nous éclairer quant à la personnalité de notre homme. »
languages.original_text: "We have our suspect. It looks like Gwedon killed his fellow worker and put on this entire bloody spectacle. Hrotko is the one responsible for arresting the rabble, so he'll be our best candidate for shedding some light on this Gwedon character."

traits.locale_text: « Nous tenons notre suspect. Tout porte à croire que Gwedon a tué son binôme et orchestré cette sanglante mise en scène. Hrotko étant responsable du maintien de l'ordre, c'est le plus indiqué pour nous éclairer quant à la personnalité de notre homme. »

languages.text: «Tenemos a nuestro sospechoso. Parece que Gwedon mató a su compañero y organizó todo este espectáculo. Hrotko es el responsable de arrestar a los plebeyos, por lo que será nuestro mejor candidato para descubrir más sobre el tal Gwedon».
languages.original_text: "We have our suspect. It looks like Gwedon killed his fellow worker and put on this entire bloody spectacle. Hrotko is the one responsible for arresting the rabble, so he'll be our best candidate for shedding some light on this Gwedon character."

traits.locale_text: «Tenemos a nuestro sospechoso. Parece que Gwedon mató a su compañero y organizó todo este espectáculo. Hrotko es el responsable de arrestar a los plebeyos, por lo que será nuestro mejor candidato para descubrir más sobre el tal Gwedon».

languages.text: “我们找到嫌疑人了。看起来，应该是戈登杀害了他的工友，之后上演了这出血腥的惨剧。赫洛卡是负责逮捕工人的人，他应该能找到关于戈登这个人的信息。”
languages.original_text: "We have our suspect. It looks like Gwedon killed his fellow worker and put on this entire bloody spectacle. Hrotko is the one responsible for arresting the rabble, so he'll be our best candidate for shedding some light on this Gwedon character."

traits.locale_text: “我们找到嫌疑人了。看起来，应该是戈登杀害了他的工友，之后上演了这出血腥的惨剧。赫洛卡是负责逮捕工人的人，他应该能找到关于戈登这个人的信息。”

languages.text: 「容疑者が浮かび上がりました。グウェンドンは同僚を殺害し、遺体を見世物にしました。フロトコは暴徒逮捕の責任者ですので、グウェドンの正体を暴くにはフロトコの話しを聞く必要があります」
languages.original_text: "We have our suspect. It looks like Gwedon killed his fellow worker and put on this entire bloody spectacle. Hrotko is the one responsible for arresting the rabble, so he'll be our best candidate for shedding some light on this Gwedon character."

traits.locale_text: 「容疑者が浮かび上がりました。グウェンドンは同僚を殺害し、遺体を見世物にしました。フロトコは暴徒逮捕の責任者ですので、グウェドンの正体を暴くにはフロトコの話しを聞く必要があります」

languages.text: "Wir haben unseren Verdächtigen. Offenbar hat Gwedon seinen Kollegen getötet und dieses blutige Spektakel veranstaltet. Hrotko ist dafür verantwortlich, Mitglieder des Pöbels zu verhaften, er kann uns also am ehesten etwas über diesen Gwedon sagen."
languages.original_text: "We have our suspect. It looks like Gwedon killed his fellow worker and put on this entire bloody spectacle. Hrotko is the one responsible for arresting the rabble, so he'll be our best candidate for shedding some light on this Gwedon character."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben unseren Verdächtigen. Offenbar hat Gwedon seinen Kollegen getötet und dieses blutige Spektakel veranstaltet. Hrotko ist dafür verantwortlich, Mitglieder des Pöbels zu verhaften, er kann uns also am ehesten etwas über diesen Gwedon sagen."

languages.text: "Şüphelimizi bulduk. Anlaşılan Gwedon, işçi arkadaşını öldürerek tüm bu kanlı manzaranın mimarlığını yapmış. Ayaktakımını tutuklamaktan Hrotko sorumlu. Bu da onu Gwedon hususunu açıklığa kavuşturmak için en iyi adayımız yapıyor."
languages.original_text: "We have our suspect. It looks like Gwedon killed his fellow worker and put on this entire bloody spectacle. Hrotko is the one responsible for arresting the rabble, so he'll be our best candidate for shedding some light on this Gwedon character."
